description: The Establishment of a Community Based Micro Credit Programme in Trinidad and Tobago (Phase 1)

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The project which is a joint programme between UNDP and the Ministry of the People and Social Development (MOPSD) aims to:
1) Assist in the eradication of poverty in Trinidad and Tobago through the generation of employment and sustainable livelihood opportunities through micro enterprises and small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in targeted areas.
2) Social mobilization.
3) Promotion of gender considerations through the economic empowerment of women.
subproject.title: Micro Credit Programme
